channel.title: The Marty After Dark Show
channel.itunes:author: Marty After Dark
channel.description: Join Marty and his eclectic group of musical and non-musical guests.
channel.itunes:summary: Join Marty and his eclectic group of musical and non-musical guests.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Short Description of the Podcast

item.title: Episode 1 - Dakota Hotel
item.description: Zac and Corinna from Dakota Hotel join Marty...after dark
item.itunes:summary: Zac and Corinna from Dakota Hotel join Marty...after dark
item.itunes:subtitle: Marty sits down with @WattMilliams to hear some live tunes from Dakota Hotel on the first episode of Marty After Dark!

item.title: Episode 2 - Eric Shorter
item.itunes:subtitle: Marty and Mike Smith sit down with Eric Shorter to talk ripped pants and hear some tunes.

item.title: Episode 3 - Mike Gleisberg and Edwin Rosa
item.description: Mike and Edwin join Marty...after dark
item.itunes:summary: Mike and Edwin join Marty...after dark
item.itunes:subtitle: Marty sits down with Edwin Rosa to talk about his upcoming film and hear some live tunes from Mike Gleisberg.

item.title: Episode 4 - Chris Lax
item.description: Chris Lax and Angel Beltran join Marty...after dark
item.itunes:summary: Chris Lax and Angel Beltran join Marty...after dark
item.itunes:subtitle: Marty sits down with co-host Angel Beltran to talk about various topics and hear some live tunes from Chris Lax.
